module-option.name: selectQuery
module-option.value: select lastchangepassdate, disposable_pass, permanent_pass FROM security_principal where name = ?

module-option.name: principalsQuery
module-option.value: SELECT p.password FROM security_principal p WHERE p.name = ? and p.isactive and (p.versionstarttime <= now() and p.versionfinaltime > now()) and (p.employee is null or exists(select * from bud_employee e where e.versioning_key = p.employee and e.versionstarttime <= now() and e.versionfinaltime > now()))

module-option.name: rolesQuery
module-option.value: SELECT DISTINCT role_name, roles FROM ( SELECT sp.name as user_name, 'Roles' as roles, 'user' as role_name FROM security_principal sp UNION SELECT sp.name as user_name, 'Roles' as roles, sr.name as role_name FROM security_principalrole spr, security_role sr, security_principal sp WHERE (sr.id = spr.role) and (sp.id = spr.principal) ) as u WHERE user_name=?
